column4: Ubuntu ver 6.06 LTS comes in 2 forms: the regular one and the 64bit one. I have an AMD 64 Athlon computer. Does this mean I should install the 64 bit one?
if you can get it to work please let me know... I havn't been able to
let you konw how?
if it works for you let me know the version
still don't know how you want me to let you know
post in here as I am doing now? what if you're not here when i do so?
I will be sure I am..
no, but if you have my name in it it will go into another window just with messages to me
Just sop u know this is my 1st time using an IRC
So the question is, HOw do I get you're name in it? I don't even know how people are including names in the cobnversations here--I am doing so by cutting and pasting
type the first couple letters then press tab
OK cool--in your case i needed 3 but i got the point
Still need to know how to let you know personally once iinstall the 64bit version
syzygyBSD: it worked for me to install the 64-bit version
OK so u just wanna know if t works for me too? is this correct?
yes
OK got it. now back to how i can let u know personally
just msg me when it works
OK sorry for my ignorance again but to msg you I need to do what? how?
/msg syzygyBSD my message
So let me see if I get this straight. I want to let you know that for example, "mom says all is fine" then I would type, " /msg syzygyBSD mom says all is fine"  is this correct?
try it
I just tried it--i see it but does this mean you just got a private message? If yes can you do the same to me so i see what you're getting?
it's 4:15 AM where I am and need to go to bed--am waiting 4 ur reply
